page.title: 14Housing in Peter Tavy Area
page.content: Most people interviewed owned their homes.These were mainly houses but with some bungalows.Everyone but one family had a garden.Two_thirds of the houses are centrally heated.Most of these use solid fuel but a few people use electric,oil or gas central heating.Several people have open fires but some have gas and electric fires.A few people use Agas or Rayburns.Most people use electricity for cooking but some use Agas or Rayburns.A few use calor gas and one person uses a woodburner.All the families have a refrigerator and most have a freezer Everyone has a vacuum cleaner.Many households have a washing machine and a tumble drier but only a few have dishwashers or microwave ovens.All the people have a television and a radio. Several people have a video,stereo and telephone but only a few a computer.
